products.title: Oslo Blackout Smoke Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo blackout smoke blue roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 7.70 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This medium smoke blue roller blind adds bold and vibrant enhancment to your room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. Their roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At swift direct blinds, we take quality seriously. Not only are we situated in the heart of the yorkshire textile industry, but their own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country. This soft blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by their blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.metadescription: Made to measure konya blackout ink blue roller blind | privacy, thermal fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya blackoutink blue plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Dark Blue (1100) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure dark blue (1100) (blackout) velux blackout roller blinds from soeasy blinds. Order quality velux blackout roller blinds online today at low prices with fast uk delivery
products.productdescription:
The velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme pvc blackout azure blue electric roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 151.50 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, boheme pvc blackout azure blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it wont let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.
 
 Product id: db-erbx1974 fabric colour: azure blue material: 3 ply vinyl, 1 ply fibreglass lining: pattern match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Whitby Blackout PVC Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Whitby blackout pvc navy blue electric roller blind in blue. Made to measure from 161.20 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Whitby pvc blackout navy blue is a fabulous boys blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space.The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.
 
 Product id: db-erbx1993 fabric colour: navy blue material: 29% pvc 71% fibreglass lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Quackers PVC Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind in yellow/blue/multicoloured. Made to measure from 161.20 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Instantly add something fun and quirky with quackers pvc blackout blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant fabric so is ideal for a childrens room or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. The flame retardant electric blind operation makes it easy to open and close and with blackout fabric, the children wont be disturbed by early morning light. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue electric roller blind in blue/multicoloured. Made to measure from 163.62 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry blossom blackout kimono blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is pollergen treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen. Pair your electric roller blinds with the smart hub and operate your blinds with your amazon alexa or with google home.
 
 Product id: db-erbx1995 fabric colour: kimono blue material: 80% polyester 20% cotton lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: electric control battery powered energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes
